introduction1: I'm Nahuel, a 23-year-old computer enthusiast and software developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Passionate about technology, calisthenics, and mycology.
introduction2: My background as a Computer Technician, student of Systems Engineering, and self-learner drives me to seek into new opportunities, where I can put my creativity and technical skills into action.
introduction3: Ready for challenges and new prospects. Always eager to learn, improve, and progress!
